Uses of Interface
android.widget.ListAdapter

Packages that use ListAdapter
android.app High-level classes encapsulating the overall Android application model. 
android.preference Provides classes that manage application preferences and implement the preferences UI. 
android.webkit Provides tools for browsing the web. 
android.widget The widget package contains (mostly visual) UI elements to use on your Application screen. 
 

Uses of ListAdapter in android.app
 

Fields in android.app declared as ListAdapter
protected  ListAdapter ListActivity.mAdapter
          This field should be made private, so it is hidden from the SDK.
 

Methods in android.app that return ListAdapter
 ListAdapter ListActivity.getListAdapter()
          Get the ListAdapter associated with this activity's ListView.
 

Methods in android.app with parameters of type ListAdapter
 AlertDialog.Builder AlertDialog.Builder.setAdapter(ListAdapter adapter, DialogInterface.OnClickListener listener)
          Set a list of items, which are supplied by the given ListAdapter, to be displayed in the dialog as the content, you will be notified of the selected item via the supplied listener.
 void ListActivity.setListAdapter(ListAdapter adapter)
          Provide the cursor for the list view.
 AlertDialog.Builder AlertDialog.Builder.setSingleChoiceItems(ListAdapter adapter, int checkedItem, DialogInterface.OnClickListener listener)
          Set a list of items to be displayed in the dialog as the content, you will be notified of the selected item via the supplied listener.

Classes in android.preference that implement ListAdapter

          An adapter that returns the Preference contained in this group.
 

Methods in android.preference that return ListAdapter
 ListAdapter PreferenceScreen.getRootAdapter()
          Returns an adapter that can be attached to a PreferenceActivity to show the preferences contained in this PreferenceScreen.
protected  ListAdapter PreferenceScreen.onCreateRootAdapter()
          Creates the root adapter.
 

Uses of ListAdapter in android.webkit
 

Classes in android.webkit that implement ListAdapter
static class TextDialog.AutoCompleteAdapter
          This is a special version of ArrayAdapter which changes its text size to match the text size of its host TextView.
 

Uses of ListAdapter in android.widget
 

Subinterfaces of ListAdapter in android.widget
 interface WrapperListAdapter
          List adapter that wraps another list adapter.
 

Classes in android.widget that implement ListAdapter
 class ArrayAdapter<T>
          A ListAdapter that manages a ListView backed by an array of arbitrary objects.
 class BaseAdapter
          Common base class of common implementation for an Adapter that can be used in both ListView (by implementing the specialized ListAdapter interface} and Spinner (by implementing the specialized SpinnerAdapter interface.
 class CursorAdapter
          Adapter that exposes data from a Cursor to a ListView widget.
(package private)  class ExpandableListConnector
          A BaseAdapter that provides data/Views in an expandable list (offers features such as collapsing/expanding groups containing children).
 class HeaderViewListAdapter
          ListAdapter used when a ListView has header views.
 class ResourceCursorAdapter
          An easy adapter that creates views defined in an XML file.
 class SimpleAdapter
          An easy adapter to map static data to views defined in an XML file.
 class SimpleCursorAdapter
          An easy adapter to map columns from a cursor to TextViews or ImageViews defined in an XML file.
 

Fields in android.widget declared as ListAdapter
(package private)  ListAdapter AbsListView.mAdapter
          The adapter containing the data to be displayed by this view
 

Methods in android.widget with type parameters of type ListAdapter
<T extends ListAdapter & Filterable>
void
AutoCompleteTextView.setAdapter(T adapter)
          Changes the list of data used for auto completion.
 

Methods in android.widget that return ListAdapter
 ListAdapter AutoCompleteTextView.getAdapter()
          Returns a filterable list adapter used for auto completion.
 ListAdapter GridView.getAdapter()
           
 ListAdapter ListView.getAdapter()
          Returns the adapter currently in use in this ListView.
 ListAdapter ExpandableListView.getAdapter()
          This method should not be used, use ExpandableListView.getExpandableListAdapter().
 ListAdapter HeaderViewListAdapter.getWrappedAdapter()
           
 ListAdapter WrapperListAdapter.getWrappedAdapter()
          Returns the adapter wrapped by this list adapter.
 

Methods in android.widget with parameters of type ListAdapter
 void GridView.setAdapter(ListAdapter adapter)
          Sets the data behind this GridView.
 void ListView.setAdapter(ListAdapter adapter)
          Sets the data behind this ListView.
 void ExpandableListView.setAdapter(ListAdapter adapter)
          This overloaded method should not be used, instead use ExpandableListView.setAdapter(ExpandableListAdapter).
